properties.name: batch.chunk-size
properties.description: Default: 100, Number of items that are processed in a single transaction by a chunk-oriented step.

properties.name: batch.skip-limit
properties.description: Default: 10, Maximum number of items to skip as per configured Skip policy, exceeding which fails the job.

properties.name: batch.max-retries
properties.description: Default: 3, Maximum number of retry attempts as configured Retry policy, exceeding which fails the job.

properties.name: batch.backoff-initial-delay
properties.description: Default: false, Time duration (in java.time.Duration format) to wait before the first retry attempt is made after a failure.

properties.name: batch.backoff-multiplier
properties.description: Default: 3, Factor by which the delay between consecutive retries is multiplied.

properties.name: batch.page-size
properties.description: Default: 100, Number of records to be read in each page by Paging Item readers.

properties.name: batch.partition-size
properties.description: Default: 8, Number of partitions that will be used to process the data concurrently. Should be optimized as per available machine resources.

properties.name: batch.trigger-partitioning-threshold
properties.description: Default: 100, Minimum number of records to trigger partitioning otherwise it could be counter productive to do partitioning.

properties.name: batch.run-id-sequence
properties.description: Default: run_id_sequence, Run Id database sequence name
